The goal of the game is to make as many clicks/taps on the Algorand icon as possible within the 7 second interval.

To play you need to connect your Pera wallet by using the button in the bottom of the screen.

Afterwards you need to pay a 0.2 Algo fee by using the "new attempt" button in the bottom of the screen.

Upon successfull payment, you start the gaame and the 7 second timer by tapping on the Algorand icon in teh center of the screen.

Each click is one entry in the raffle and is also recorded as a transaction on the algorand network.

To play again, simply refresh the page and repeat the process. Total sum of all your attempts will be counted in the raffle.

Raffle is done on each 1st day of the month and the prize pool is 90% of all tickets paid with 10% being rolled over to next months raffle.
